quote: He thinks Goliath can end the war,"" Alek managed at last. ""The man wants peace!"" ""As do we all,"" Count Volger said. ""But there are many ways to end a war. Some are more peaceful than others.
quote_letters: HE THINKS GOLIATH CAN END THE WAR ALEK MANAGED AT LAST THE MAN WANTS PEACE AS DO WE ALL COUNT VOLGER SAID BUT THERE ARE MANY WAYS TO END A WAR SOME ARE MORE PEACEFUL THAN OTHERS
